pkgmetadata.longdescription: Matrix Normal Distribution // Density computation, random matrix generation and maximum likelihood estimation of the matrix normal distribution. References: Pocuca N., Gallaugher M. P., Clark K. M. McNicholas P. D. (2019). Assessing and Visualizing Matrix Variate Normality. doi:10.48550/arXiv.1910.02859 and the relevant wikipedia page.
